text: "Heaven Beside You" is a 1996 song by Alice in Chains. It is the second single from their third studio album Alice in Chains and was included on their greatest hits albums Music Bank, Greatest Hits and The Essential Alice in Chains. It went to number 35 in the United Kingdom, number 60 in Australia and number 3 on the Billboard Mainstream Rock charts. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:1996 songs Category:Alternative rock songs Category:Alice in Chains songs
title: Heaven Beside You
